thread.section_title: CrackBerry.com - The #1 Site for BlackBerry Users (and Abusers!)
thread.title: Subscribe for BlackBerry KEYone Updates!

author: Bla1ze
title: Subscribe for BlackBerry KEYone Updates!
text:
The BlackBerry KEYone is almost here, and we can't wait. BlackBerry Mobile unveiled the device at Mobile World Congress 2017 and let the world know it will be available globally starting in April. Sign up for updates to get the latest news!

The BlackBerry KEYone is almost here, and we can't wait. BlackBerry Mobile unveiled the device at Mobile World Congress 2017 and let the world know it will be available globally starting in April. Until then we're going to have all the latest news and updates about where to buy the device, who has pre-orders opening up and more.
To ensure you don't miss any of our coverage, fill out the form below to subscribe!
Important: We're asking for a little more info than normal for a great reason . We want to be able to get to know and communicate with you better. Example: We'd love to know what city you're in, so if we hold a CrackBerry Meet-up in your area we can email you about it! (Don't worry, the data will not be shared, and only your name and email address is mandatory!)
Name * 
Email * 
CrackBerry Username 
City 
Country 
How many years have you been a BlackBerry user? 
What BlackBerry/Phone are you using now? 
Which carrier are you on? 
Twitter 
Instagram 
Snapchat 
Occupation 

* Required field
*/
